official_title: To amend the United States Housing Act of 1937 to permit the use of housing vouchers to assist lower income families affected by the prepayment of mortgages on projects subsidized by the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development.
short_title: Housing Certificate and Voucher Assistance Improvement Act of 1989

summary.text: Housing Certificate and Voucher Assistance Improvement Act of 1989 - Amends the United States Housing Act of 1937 to permit the use of housing vouchers and housing certificate assistance to aid lower income families involuntarily displaced by mortgage prepayments on Department of Housing and Urban Development projects.

titles.title: Housing Certificate and Voucher Assistance Improvement Act of 1989

To amend the United States Housing Act of 1937 to permit the use of housing vouchers to assist lower income families affected by the prepayment of mortgages on projects subsidized by the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development.
